SUBJECT: Alex - Winexviv International Limited development support

Hi Alex,

Noticed Winexviv International Limited is hiring. Scaling the team?

I'm David Ariyo, Full Stack Developer. Recently built Dassage Communication Platform - Real-time messaging with video calls, file sharing, WebSocket architecture.

Tech: React, Node.js, MongoDB, WebSocket | 100+ concurrent users

Based in Nigeria too - always excited to support local tech growth.

Ever need freelance dev support at Winexviv International Limited?

Best,
David Ariyo
Full Stack Developer | MERN Stack
